ygData.subject: Re: Collapsible fishing pole & Spyglass
ygData.msgSnippet: I truly hope this is the case.  And I don t mean to rag on him.  If he wants to keep it secret, that s his choice.  I respect that.  I d be tempted myself.
ygData.messageBody:
I truly hope this is the case. And I don't mean to rag on him. If he
wants to keep it secret, that's his choice. I respect that. I'd be
tempted myself.

But, the spyglass plans are "in the book" (I know....) and relies upon the
collapsible fishing pole. Therefore, what harm is done giving the plans
out for the spyglasses when no one knows how to build the fishing pole.



At 01:00 PM 08/10/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: AOLTechDaZ@...
>
>I doubt he is keeping it secret looks like he just made an html error or
>forgot. Why would he list the spyglass recipe? Geez people wait till he
>responds before you rag on him. I am sure he either doesn't know the recipe
>or just forgot.
>
